description:
Red Mane, is the name I chose for this image. An unexpected confrontation with the elk in their natural environment. There was a lot of rain that day and you can see the traces of it on his mane. One of my closest shot of deers. I love the details of his antler and the traces of the rain on his mane, yes you can see it, it is still wet.

I hope you are also enjoying this as much as I do. This was the photo of the day of our visit to National Park in the Netherlands.
author: Talha Can Havadar (@badgerd.goes.wild)
